file_content.text: They'll be sorting this mess out for months.
Let's hope these droids are as effective at killing Republic troops as they were at slaughtering Republic officials.
I expect Holowan will undergo a major image change after this little scandal.
I'm sure they'll be more receptive to dealing with the Empire anyway.
They could prove useful.
We'll see what else they have to offer, first.
Probably.
Let's conclude this. Quickly.
I'm going to miss working with you. My job is rarely this entertaining.
Don't wait, it'll be next to impossible to reprogram the droids during the testing.
Call me Ryleah. Imperial Intelligence. I was hoping you'd come through here.
Enlisting even one of you would go a long way toward a successful op.
I don't want to interfere in Darth Baras's business, but I need assistance on a scale that you can deliver.
Darth Zash's uplifted apprentice. I hear you're incredibly capable. I need someone incredibly capable right now.
You've been assisting with some rather high-profile Imperial matters, I especially liked your dealing with the Fraabaal girl. I could use you.
I don't need to know why you're here, but I do need the skills a Cipher has to offer.
I keep tabs on everyone of interest in my sector, hope you don't mind. I believe you could help me with something.
A promising start-up corporation is demonstrating their flagship project for Republic military officials today. We need things to go badly.
We're not usually Republic saboteurs.
Why us?
Why select me?
I observe and report. My field training isn't up to this, and my assets in the area are limited. I'm just lucky you're here.
That's a given.
There is no "we," yet.
You're the combatant here; an influx of advanced weapons technology is going to make life harder for you, not me.
Holowan Labs' goal is to get a Republic contract for their high-grade, front line battle droids.
I believe these droids will rapidly tip the balance of power in the local sectors. I plan to make sure they tip it in our favor.
This galaxy's fate will be decided only by the might of the Sith.
You're too dependent on toys.
That's why I've come to you, my lord. This is one of those moments where a Sith's intervention will turn the tide.
I'm interested, depending on your definition of "our."
Or in favor of me.
The Empire, the Sith, of course. If you or Darth Zash have a more personal interest, I can keep that in mind.
I'm no patriot, my help comes with a price.
You mean "your" favor.
I know how bounty hunters make their living. I'm not expecting any favors.
We must share a psych profile. What's our first move?
I like where this is going.
That's wise.
Waste not want not, as they say.
What do you have in mind?
You can infiltrate Holowan Labs' testing facility and imprint the droids with new friend-or-foe recognition using this data spike.
Watch and ensure the droids kill their creators and the Republic officials, then take the schematics of their design. Simple, if dangerous.
I'll put these droids through their paces.
It shall be done.
That makes it entertaining.
I'll be watching.
Not smart. [Refuse quest]
We'll talk later.
